Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
81 Sanidassanattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukaduka
Sanidassanattika, Bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukaduka
131.
316Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
317Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
